Title: Identity Crisis
Plot: Mike is tasked with reigning in a modern day Robin Hood whose illicit deeds are putting a client's business at risk. Also, Louis must resolve his differences with Harvey to win a case. Amanda Crew and Bruce Altman guest star.
ParentalRatingReason: M Drug references and sexual references
GuestStars: Paula Newsome, Amanda Crew, Tim Russ, Bruce Altman, James Morrison
